data.text: @indigopai Hi there, thanks for your tweet. If you are a Philippine passport holder, you may need to pay Php 1,620 for Philippine Travel Tax which can be done at the travel tax counter located at the departure area. See you onboard our flight to Singapore this coming Wednesday! - Josh
@Rhys_Tea Thanks for replying Rhys. You can change your flight free of charge up until check-in closes via airport Service Desk. Thanks - Jayme

data.text: @Rhys_Tea Hi Rhys, would you mind sending us a DM of your booking reference and full name so we could check? Thanks -Kelly
@icey_aiza (2/2) You may also see this information on our website here: https://t.co/CPnLPKcrPm. - Mariz

@icey_aiza (1/2) Hi there, it may help to know that any items you bring with you on-board is subject to be weighed. We do advise this on your itinerary, and your carry-on must only consist of 2 items (1 main bag plus 1 small bag) with the combined weight of 7kg.
@Ramamboo Hi there, thanks for the tweet. So we can assist with correcting your name on the ticket, please send us your booking reference and full name via DM. Thanks - Cy
@Landerrrrr37 Regardless of what type of fare you purchased Lander we will provide the options we mentioned if the flight is not approved to operate. – Mariz

@Landerrrrr37 Hi Lander, if in any reason the flight to Okinawa is not approved we'll let customers know as soon as possible and provide options for them, which may include a refund or move to an alternative flight. I hope this information helps. - Mariz

data.text: @SimoneGallio Hi Simone, we'll be glad to check out if your flight to and from Osaka is affected by the typhoon. Please DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Maria
@ndyndud Thanks for your tweet, Cindy. Let us help you adding a baggage on your booking. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference number. Thanks - Josh

@ArrtyBit Hi there, please know that we don't advise passenger to post personal details including your booking reference publicly. You may wish to delete this tweet and kindly DM us your booking details so we can assist. - Mariz

@ArrtyBit Hi there, thanks for contacting us. I understand that you were charged for your baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference so I can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@Rhys_Tea Hi there, thanks for you tweet. It may help to know that skateboards must be checked-in and cannot be carried onboard. Thanks - Jayme

data.text: @taozitao Hi Taozitao, I’ve responded to your DM. Thanks – Maria
@lmakrifatul Thanks for tagging us about your upcoming flight. Would you mind sending us a DM of your booking references along with your name? We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry
@vienniec Hi there, I’ve responded to your DM. - Mariz
@xwangbu Hi Erik, thanks for contacting us. I understand that your flight was moved. Could you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@akaOshinC Hi Joana, yes I can help you with your booking. Could you DM us your booking reference with more info so I can check how can I help? Thanks - Jayme
@sirpeter Hey, thanks for the tag. I hope you'll enjoy your travel. Cheers - Lee
@Senthur13546664 (2/2) Just a reminder though once we’ve completed the booking, payment must be done via Manage Booking on our website using credit card only within the duration of the chat. - Mariz

data.text: @Senthur13546664 Hi there, we currently have no issues reported on our payment page on our website. I would suggest disabling your browser’s pop-up blocker or try clearing your browsing cookies and cache. Alternatively, you may also book in incognito/private mode. I hope this works! - Mariz

@bryandmlee Hi Bryan, if you have a checked baggage, for Jetstar 3K international flights check-in counter opens 2 hours before departure. For this, please make sure to arrive at the airport plenty of time to go through security and obtain your boarding pass before check-in closes. - Mariz

@bryandmlee (1/2) Hi Bryan, if you arrive 2 or 3 hours earlier before your flight you may consider doing online check-in if it’s available on your route this opens 2 days before the flight or if you prefer you may just check-in at the Jetstar check-in counter at the airport.

data.text: @bgmramirez Hi there, I understand you're concerned about the status of your flight. So we can check this, please DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Maria
@TjhinMarilyn Thanks for sending this through Lynn. For security purposes, may I confirm if this is Marilyn Chandra Tjhin that we're speaking with? Thanks - Cy
@TjhinMarilyn Hi Lynn, kindly DM us the booking reference along with your full name as listed on the booking. We'd like to look into this for you. Thanks! -Kelly

data.text: @TjhinMarilyn Hi Lynn, thanks for the Tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Thanks - Cy
@widiasihr Het, I've responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee

@andrewmortlock Hi Andrew, we try to avoid cancelling flights whenever we can - especially that you are attending your grandmother's birthday. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference, so we can see how we might be able to help? - Lee
@widdtr Thanks for your tweet, Widiarti. Please note that I have already responded to your DM. Thanks! - Josh
@widiasihr Hi Diwi, We'd be happy to assist with rescheduling one of the passengers on the booking. Kindly DM us your booking details along with your full name so I can further assist. Thanks - Joie

data.text: @AnisBakaNeko Hi Anis, thanks for getting back. Passengers are only allowed to carry 350ml (millilitres) or 350gm (grams) of inorganic powder per person through a screening point. This must be securely packed in your baggage. Thanks - Cy
@officialbenmc 2/2 your feedback. I hope on your next travel with us, it'll be a lot smoother. Best -Kelly

@officialbenmc 1/2 Hi Ben, I do understand where you're coming from, this is why we've offered the option to up your 7kgs carry-on into 10kgs upon booking. If you have checked baggage allowance though, it's also recommended to utilise it prior to checking it in. Still, we thank you for sharing

@officialbenmc 2/2 as adding it while booking is considerably cheaper. For future travels, it'll be best to make sure that you're within your allowance to avoid any penalties at the airport. I hope despite this, you've had a blissufl flight. -Kelly

data.text: @officialbenmc 1/2 Hi Ben, I can appreciate that it's frustrating to pay more for excess carry-on weight which is why we've taken care to outline your limit on your itinerary and on our website. We've also provided an option to add more allowance upon booking, if you'll be bringing more baggage
@JamesyR1 Hi Jamesy, I understand that you were disappointed with the service received from our staff. Could you provide us more details via DM so we could look into this? - Yen

@kaihendry Hi Kai, thanks for replying. I understand that you're unable to send the itinerary on the website. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name so I can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@kaihendry Hi Kai, I can appreciate that it'll be convenient but you may also access it on-the-go by using our Manage Booking portal here: https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr I hope this helps! -Kelly
@iamsupergilbert Hey GSP, I can confirm that there's no reported outages as of the moment. I would suggest that you clear your cache and cookies or try using incognito or other browser. - Lee
@DesiPuspandini Glad to hear that we’re able to assist Desi. Hope you’re excited on your upcoming travel. :) Cheers - Lee
@DesiPuspandini Hi Desi, could you send us a DM along with your full name and booking details so we can check this for you. - Mariz
@sngaturi Hi Suwardi, once you have change your flights on the booking. You'll be sent an updated itinerary and invoice. The change fees would reflect on your new invoice. Thanks - Joie
Travellers rank Jetstar Asia's customer service among the best in 2019. Click for behind-the-scenes cabin crew training   https://t.co/xgJvWSXdug. Read here for more info at https://t.co/CKPOuI8EDM
@Henny_0801 Thanks for tagging us about our available flight. It may be worth noting that we don't operate a flight from Medan to Singapore every Thursday. I hope this helps. - Jerry
@Patrick65107111 Hi Patrick, I've responded to your DM. You may wish to check your inbox. - Maria

@Patrick65107111 Hi Patrick, I'm concerned to hear that you haven't received your mobile boarding pass. Would you mind sending us a DM along with your booking reference and full name so we can see how we can help? Thanks - Maria
@Anis03745278 2/2 If you are travelling on an international flight, the liquid containers must fit on a sealed bag with are not more than 80cm (eg, 20 x 20cm or 15 x 25cm). Hope this helps! - Josh

data.text: @Anis03745278 1/2 Hi Anis, thanks for replying. I've checked our system and I'm really sorry if you were accidentally blocked on our page. Please be assured that it's now sorted. Regarding your concern, each container must not exceed 100ml.

@faithfulllyours That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Faith! Would you mind sending us a DM with more details of your experience so we can look into it further? Thanks - Maria

@AnisBakaNeko Hi Anis, power bank is allowed onboard as long as it's less than 100Wh. To check, multiply its voltage (V) and its amp hours (Ah). Liquid make is fine as well. Please ensure that it's container should not be more than 100ml. Thanks! - Josh

@Chris19437249 Hi Chris, thanks for your tweet. Our office is located at (HT & T Philippines, Inc.) Unit 1818, Tower 1 High Street South Corporate Plaza, 26th Street, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig City, Philippines 1634. They are open Monday - Friday between 08:30 am to 05:00 pm. Thanks - Josh
@DoloresPicot I'm so glad our crew was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. Thanks for letting us know Dolores! Hope to have you on-board again soon. :) - Cy
@hanarwdh Hi Hana, we can absolutely assist you in updating your name on your booking. Would you mind sending us your booking reference and your name via DM please? Thanks - H

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @AdolfoIngrid Hi there, if you could send your tweet in English, we would be more than happy to further assist you. Thanks - Lee

@H1LL1NGDON1 Thanks for your kind words for our Phuket team, Harry. I'm sure that they would love to hear about this, please DM us your booking reference and full name so we can correctly forward this to the right team. :) - Lindsay

@AdolfoIngrid (2/2) This is why it’s best to immediately look for our service desk or our staff at the airport for assistance. We value your comments on this though, as knowing your first-hand experience will definitely help us drive improvements to our service. - Mariz

@AdolfoIngrid (1/2) Hi Mary, I appreciate that missing your flight is one of the most upsetting things that can happen when you're travelling. Once you’ve missed your flight, your ticket is already forfeited as such you would need to book another flight.

data.text: @animenur Thanks for tagging us. I can see that you're having some difficulties in reaching us from Indonesia. Feel free to DM us your concern so we can check how we can assist you on our end. Hope to hear from you soon. - Jerry

@Fauziah_Amri Thanks for getting in touch. I understand that you're having some difficulties in checking-in for your flight. So I can check this, could you please DM us your booking reference and name listed on the booking? Thanks - Jerry

@bungefitz Thanks for the tweet. I hope you can understand that we don’t like delays with your travel plans either but safety will always be our top priority. The estimated time of departure for flight JQ 442 is 9:15 pm. You can check the flight status here: hhttps://bit.ly/2kYlPPd. - Joie
@susyahh Hi Susy, thanks for the tweet. We've responded to your DM, kindly check your inbox. Thanks - Yen

@lloydthelostboy Thanks for tagging us. I understand that you would like to know the check-in time for your flight from Singapore to Darwin. So I can check this, could you please DM us your booking reference and name listed on the booking? Thanks - Jerry
@plain_moshi Hi there. Jetstar is located at Terminal two (2) of Soekarno-Hatta Jakarta International Airport. Hope this helps. Thanks - H

@oneaddy2many HI Adeline, thanks for contacting Jetstar. 3K-684 flight is now delayed and the new departure time is now at 10:10am. I'm sorry if you were not advised about the delay. You may able to check the status of your flight here: https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL. Thanks - Jayme
